Description: Painted pottery shabti of Wennefer with a black lappet-wig with yellow braids, a brown face with black and white eyes, a yellow, black and red collar enclosing the brown crossed hands in relief; the body is white, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
